C - Consistency Data returned is the latest whenever it is requested.
Ways to achieve consistenty Read after Write Consistency
 A new data is acknowledged to be written only when the data is written to all the nodes/subset of nodes in the system.  A - Availability Data is returned whenever it is requested for.
Ways to acheive availability
 Have multiple replicas of nodes in the system.  P - Partition Tolerance The system operates even when messages are dropped/delayed by network between nodes
Ways to achieve partition tolerance
 Have an active/standby setup for networks.  CAP Theorm states that any distributed system can have atmost 2 of the 3 desirable properties
title: CAP Theorm
